Attacks.Name: Hydro Pump
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, this character gains power equal to the damage dealt. If a wild is rolled, the target character is pushed away L distance from Mega Starmie and gains the Soaked special condition.

Attacks.Name: Psychic
Attacks.Effect: If a wild is rolled during this attack, the target character is lifted and placed within range 3 of their current position and gains the Confused and Stun special conditions.

Attacks.Name: Rapid Spin
Attacks.Effect: After this attack is resolved, Mega Starmie may make an immediate move action. During this move, it can move through characters and terrain without penalty. If a wild is rolled, remove all special conditions from Mega Starmie and gain 2 power.

Superpowers.Name: Aqua Tactics (Affiliation: Misty's Team)
Superpowers.Effect: Friendly characters with the Water type add 1 die to their defense rolls and gain 1 power at the start of their activation. Additionally, friendly Water-type characters may ignore terrain when moving.

Superpowers.Name: Natural Cure
Superpowers.Effect: At the start of this character's activation, remove all special conditions from it and gain 2 power.

Superpowers.Name: Analytic
Superpowers.Effect: If this character attacks after all other characters have activated this round, add 2 dice to the attack roll.

Superpowers.Name: Cosmic Power
Superpowers.Effect: Add 3 dice to Mega Starmie's defense rolls and gain 2 power until the start of its next activation. This superpower can be used only once per turn.

Superpowers.Name: Recover
Superpowers.Effect: Remove 4 damage from this character and gain 2 power. This superpower can be used only once per game.

Superpowers.Name: Stellar Flare
Superpowers.Effect: All enemy characters within range and line of sight suffer 2 damage and gain the Confused special condition. This superpower can be used only once per game.
